overview: Four 100-foot rolls spontaneously edited in-camera.  1-"Desert Skies": A road trip between Green River, Utah; Ely, Nevada and Gallup, NM.  2-"Rose Porphyry": A macro-descent into the shadowy labyrinth of roses. 3-"Monks Memoriam": A gray spring day following the untimely death of a friend's beloved pet.  4-"Coda":  A multi-layered bon-voyage to Kodak's finest emulsion.
title: Quartet (In-Camera)
